name: Chamomile
properties: Mild, floral aroma; known for calming effects
benefits: Helps reduce anxiety and promotes better sleep quality. Contains antioxidants that may help reduce inflammation.
scientific_evidence: Studies suggest chamomile can improve sleep quality and reduce anxiety symptoms in some individuals.

name: Lavender
properties: Sweet, floral scent; popular in aromatherapy
benefits: Helps reduce anxiety and improve sleep quality. Can help alleviate mild pain and skin irritation.
scientific_evidence: Research indicates lavender aromatherapy may help reduce anxiety and improve sleep quality in certain populations.

name: Green Tea
properties: Light, slightly bitter taste; contains caffeine and L-theanine
benefits: Contains antioxidants that may help prevent cell damage. The combination of caffeine and L-theanine provides energy without jitters.
scientific_evidence: Studies suggest green tea consumption may be associated with improved cognitive function and metabolism.

name: Ginseng
benefits: May help improve energy levels and cognitive function. Acts as an adaptogen to help the body resist stressors.
scientific_evidence: Some research suggests ginseng may improve cognitive performance and reduce fatigue.

name: Ginger
benefits: Helps alleviate nausea and improve digestion. Has anti-inflammatory properties that may help with pain reduction.
scientific_evidence: Clinical studies support ginger's effectiveness for nausea, especially pregnancy-related morning sickness.

name: Peppermint
benefits: Helps relieve digestive discomfort and IBS symptoms. The scent can enhance alertness and memory.
scientific_evidence: Research supports peppermint oil's effectiveness for IBS symptoms and tension headaches.

name: Fennel
benefits: Helps relieve bloating and digestive discomfort. May help reduce appetite and support weight management.
scientific_evidence: Traditional use for digestive issues is supported by some clinical research showing effectiveness for IBS and colic.

name: Probiotics
benefits: Helps maintain healthy gut microbiome balance. May support immune function and improve digestion.
scientific_evidence: Substantial research supports specific probiotic strains for various gut conditions, though effects are strain-specific.

name: Melatonin
properties: Hormone naturally produced by the body; regulates sleep-wake cycle
benefits: Helps regulate sleep-wake cycles. Useful for jet lag and certain sleep disorders.
scientific_evidence: Strong evidence supports melatonin use for jet lag and some types of insomnia, particularly in older adults.

name: Valerian Root
properties: Earthy, somewhat unpleasant smell; sedative properties
benefits: May help improve sleep quality and reduce the time to fall asleep. May help reduce anxiety symptoms.
scientific_evidence: Mixed results in clinical studies, but some evidence supports its mild sedative effects for sleep problems.
